== Aralam (627256) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Aralam is a village in the [[Thalassery]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 11245 hectares and harbouring 6904 households with total population of 29328 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Mattannur]] is at a distance of 21 km. Male population is 14438 and female population is 14890. Scheduled Caste Population is 388 and Scheduled Tribes population is 4359. Census Location Code of the village is 627256<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 23518 (80.19%)
* Literate male population: 11881 (82.29%)
* Literate female population: 11637 (78.15%)
